title: Bree needs a friend
content:
Any suggestions of type that would pair well with Bree? [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/bree/overview.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063741/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/bree/overview.html "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/type-together/bree/overview.html")

The typeface from type-together.
author: evanmacdonald

comments.content:
What about their Karmina Sans?  
Same designers, same touch.

Ronnia from type together looks like a good compagnion to me.  
At first sight FS Albert could be an interesting partner too  
 [http://www.fontsmith.com/news.php?id=509](http://web.archive.org/web/20150125063741/http:/www.fontsmith.com/news.php?id=509 "http://www.fontsmith.com/news.php?id=509")
